articles.description: SteelSeries debuted a new Arctis 1 Wireless that works with Xbox. It will feature a design from Cyberpunk 2077 at launch. The company also showed off new accessory packs that fit the theme of the game for the Arctis Pro headsets.
articles.content:
Its available now
SteelSeries has unveiled a fleet of Cyberpunk 2077-inspired gaming headsets as well as a lineup of themed accessories made for its Arctis Pro wired and wireless headsets. First up, though, is a headset that is actually brand-new to the comp… [+2445 chars]

articles.title: Hardspace: Shipbreaker Is a Different Kind of FPS (Behind-the-Scenes Episode 1) - IGN
articles.description: Hardspace: Shipbreaker is "a first-person, zero-G, spaceship salvaging game," according to its developers. You're a blue-collar worker who quickly comes to f...
articles.content: Hardspace: Shipbreaker is "a first-person, zero-G, spaceship salvaging game," according to its developers. You're a blue-collar worker who quickly comes to find that the Lynx corporate overlords you work for are, well...evil. And not even death is an escape. … [+69 chars]

articles.author: Phillip Martinez
articles.title: 'Pokémon Go' Buddy Up Event: Start Time, Shiny Volbeat and Illumise & More - Newsweek
articles.description: Trainers can catch either Volbeat or Illumise in their region for the first time.
articles.content:
Niantic is celebrating the Buddy Pokémon feature in Pokémon Go with a brand new in-game event.
The Buddy Up Event is set to begin this week and bring players some rare Pokémon and chances to catch some of the mobile game's most popular Buddy Pokémon. As the … [+2479 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Nier mobile game Nier Reincarnation: first gameplay footage released - Polygon
articles.description: Square Enix’s mobile spinoff Nier Reincarnation is coming to Android and iPhone. The publisher released first footage of the spinoff game over the weekend.
articles.content: Square Enixs mobile spinoff has that Nier atmosphere

articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.title: You Can Still Buy A Nintendo Switch Lite Bundle At GameStop - GameSpot
articles.description: GameStop still has an "all-in-one bundle" for the Switch Lite that comes with a copy of Animal Crossing: New Horizons and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.
articles.content: The Nintendo Switch is currently seeing a major worldwide shortage, the likes of which we haven't seen since its release in 2017. People are clamoring to get their hands on the console, most likely due to being stuck inside because of the coronavirus pandemic… [+2327 chars]

articles.description: The long-awaited release boldly reimagines a classic video game and adds a few unexpected twists

articles.content: LG's smartphone business has been in trouble for some time thanks to uninspiring hardware, dated software, and a dismal record on updates. The most recent LG flagships the G8X ThinQ and V60 ThinQ launched with dual-screen gimmicks that tried to piggyback on t… [+1637 chars]

articles.title: Drum machine app uses your smartphone as a virtual 'pedal' - Engadget
articles.description: If you’re a musician looking to add drum beats or loops via a pedal, a Finnish company called Kovaluu has unveiled a cheap solution. Its app for iOS and Android, called Beats and Loops, transforms your smartphone into a virtual pedal. You can trigger a loop o…
articles.content: The drum machine comes with 50 drum presets, along with fills and A/B parts that can be triggered hands-free. It also has a looper with unlimited overdubs so that you can trigger backing parts while you play. “The looper can be used with just the phone microp… [+987 chars]
